overview: csvtk is a cross-platform, efficient, and practical CSV/TSV toolkit for working with flat files. It aims to make it easy to work with csv and tsv data, providing a variety of functionalities for processing, cleaning, and analyzing tabular data.
core_features: Convert between CSV and TSV formats
Merge multiple files by rows or columns
Filter rows or columns based on specified conditions
Sort data based on specified columns
Join tables based on specified keys
Split large files into smaller chunks
